sentences.en: A beard doesn't scratch, it just tickles.
sentences.cn: 下巴上的胡子不刮人，就是叫人痒痒。

sentences.en: Don't be a baby and cry over that little scratch.
sentences.cn: 别那么孩子气,擦破点皮就哭个不停.

sentences.en: Don't be a cry baby. That tiny scratch can hardly hurt at all.
sentences.cn: 不要一碰就哭, 那么一点伤根本就不怎么痛.

sentences.en: Don’t worry, it’s only a scratch (= not a serious injury ) .
sentences.cn: 别担心，只是一道划伤。

sentences.en: He brushed his hair and gave his scalp a good scratch .
sentences.cn: 他梳了一下头发，又使劲挠了挠头皮。

sentences.en: He stretched and had a scratch .
sentences.cn: 他伸了个懒腰，抓了抓痒。

sentences.en: He stretched and had a scratch.
sentences.cn: 他伸了个懒腰，抓了抓痒。

sentences.en: her German was not up to scratch.
sentences.cn: 她的德语还不行。

sentences.en: Her performance wasn't up to scratch.
sentences.cn: 她的演奏没达到水准.

sentences.en: I’m afraid I’ve scratched your car.
sentences.cn: 不好意思，我把你的汽车给刮坏了。

sentences.en: It's completely ruined, so we'll have to start from scratch.
sentences.cn: 它完全毁了, 我们只好从头做起.

sentences.en: It's just a scratch. Stop whining.
sentences.cn: 只是刮了一道，别埋怨了。

sentences.en: It's only a scratch.
sentences.cn: 只是擦破了点油皮儿.

sentences.en: John yawned and scratched his leg.
sentences.cn: 约翰打了个呵欠，挠了挠腿。

sentences.en: Knives will scratch the worktop.
sentences.cn: 小刀会在工作台上留下划痕。

sentences.en: My mother always made me feel I wasn't coming up to scratch.
sentences.cn: 母亲总是使我觉得自己不够优秀。

sentences.en: research has only scratched the surface of the paranormal.
sentences.cn: 研究仅涉及超正常范围的表面。

sentences.en: Scratch my back—I've got an itch.
sentences.cn: 帮我挠挠背——有点痒。

sentences.en: Scratch my name out please.
sentences.cn: 请把我的名字划掉.

sentences.en: Scratch the subject of defence and acronyms, abbreviations, and buzzwords fly out.
sentences.cn: 话题触及国防,缩合字, 缩写字和行话就满天飞.

sentences.en: Scratch yourself if you itch.
sentences.cn: 如果你感到痒,就搔好了.

sentences.en: She was unharmed apart from a few cuts and scratches.
sentences.cn: 除了几处皮外伤外，她安然无恙。

sentences.en: The old man lifted his cardigan to scratch his side.
sentences.cn: 老人撩起开襟毛衣挠了挠身体的一侧。

sentences.en: The suggestion is that they should start from scratch.
sentences.cn: 提出的建议是,他们从头开始.

sentences.en: There was a big scratch on the car door.
sentences.cn: 车门上有一条深深的划痕。

sentences.en: There were deep scratches all over her face.
sentences.cn: 她脸上全是深深的伤痕。

sentences.en: they believe that if you scratch a homophobe, you'll probably find a racist.
sentences.cn: 他们确信如果你剥去一个厌恶同性恋者的外衣，一个种族主义者的真面目就会暴露无遗。

sentences.en: they have a boring image but scratch the surface and it's fascinating.
sentences.cn: 它们有种令人生厌的形象，可是一旦调查起来，却很令人着迷。

sentences.en: Try not to scratch.
sentences.cn: 尽量别挠。

words.tran_cn: 潦草的；刺痒的；草率的；发刮擦声的
打草稿用的；凑合的；碰巧的
抓；搔；发刮擦声；勉强糊口；退出比赛

phrases.tran_cn: [指揭露某人（或某事）真面目的调查]除去…的假象你将发现…的本质
(非正式)冥思苦想问题的解答
从头开始；白手起家；从起跑线开始
一点儿也没受伤，安然无恙

phrases.phrase: you scratch my back and I'll scratch yours
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)你帮我，我帮你；投我以桃，报之以李

trans.tran_cn: 划痕，划伤，刮/擦的刺耳声，挠痒
trans.tran_en: a small cut on someone’s skin

trans.tran_cn: 挠，搔，划伤，刮坏，勉强维生，取消
trans.tran_en: to rub your skin with your nails because it feels uncomfortable
to rub your skin with your nails because it feels uncomfortable
to cut someone’s skin slightly with your nails or with something sharp
to rub your skin with your nails because it feels uncomfortable
